name: bbin

scripts.prepush: git commit --quiet -m "npmjs: $(npm --no-git-tag-version version patch)" README.md package.json
scripts.global: npm -g install --quiet $(npm show bbin packages) bbin
scripts.uninstall: npm -g uninstall --quiet $(npm show bbin packages) bbin

packages: cloudflare-cli semver shaurl spoof vercel wrangler
